body:
Set Quoted_Identifier ON
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
Create Function dbo.Fn_Rn_System_GetActivePersonelID ()
Returns int
As Begin
    Declare @KullaniciID int
    Set @KullaniciID = (Select  KullaniciID From RN100_Kullanicilar Where KullaniciKodu = (Select    dbo.F100_GetKullaniciConn()))
    Return (Select  MAX(PersonelID)From RN01_Personel Where KullaniciID = @KullaniciID)
End
 
GO
